price: (Dikatakan kepada mereka), "Masuklah kamu ke pintu-pintu neraka Jahanam, sedang kamu kekal di dalamnya. Maka itulah seburuk-buruk tempat bagi orang-orang yang sombong".
arabic: ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
